tiles.title: Port of Roscoff, France
tiles.text: Such a crispy night. The sea is calm, and a cold breeze caresses your skin. The Vauban is waiting for you, captain.

tiles.title: Aboard the Vauban
tiles.text:
-Where are the keys..
Got it. Inside the cabin, everythings is covered by darkness. The moon is hidden by dark clouds.

tiles.title: Aboard the Vauban
tiles.text: A seagull has just landed af the bow, looking for small fishes and offal.

items.name: Radio
items.messageAfterUse:
You switched on the radio on the weather channel:
..today's forecast is covered with heavy rain, sea calm.
